title: Jennifer Garner is practically the same height as her teen daughter Violet, 13
text:
She's the mom to Violet, 13, Seraphina, 10, and Samuel, seven.

And Jennifer Garner was seen stepping out hand-in-hand to lunch with her eldest child on Sunday, following Church.

The 5ft8 37-year-old was dressed chic and sophisticated as she walked alongside her 13-year-old who was nearly her same height.

Just like mom! Jennifer Garner was spotted walking hand-in-hand with her eldest daughter on Sunday morning with the 13-year-old nearly up to her 5ft8 stature

Jennifer rocked a grey knit sweater for the cool fall morning.

She teamed the look with a tight pencil skirt that was black with a tan colored strip around the hem.

The actress flashed her toned legs and completed her ensemble with a pair of black oxford shoes.

Keeping warm and cost: Jennifer rocked a grey knit sweater for the cool fall morning

Stylish: She teamed the look with a tight pencil skirt that was black with a tan colored strip around the hem

Casual look: Violet opted for a v-neck dress and added a T-shirt underneath to keep modest

Jennifer styled her brunette tresses out naturally and appeared to be wearing a natural amount of makeup.

Violet opted for a v-neck dress and added a T-shirt underneath to keep modest.

Her hair was left out and she was seen with her glasses while walking hand-in-hand with her mom.

Natural beauty: Jennifer styled her brunette tresses out naturally and appeared to be wearing a natural amount of makeup

One-on-one daughter time: Earlier in the day, Jennifer was seen spending some one-on-one time with her middle child, Seraphina, at church

Earlier in the day, Jennifer was seen spending some one-on-one time with her middle child, Seraphina, at church.

Seraphina was dressed in a denim dress and rocked her signature mismatched bright and bold socks.

Not seen on Sunday was Jennifer's youngest, son, Samuel, seven.

She's got spunk! Seraphina was dressed in a denim dress and rocked her signature mismatched bright and bold socks

Girl's day: Jennifer's ex-husband, Ben Affleck, wasn't there either. He's frequently spotted with the family as they continue to co-parent their kids

Jennifer's ex-husband, Ben Affleck, wasn't there either. He's frequently spotted with the family as they continue to co-parent their kids.

The former couple began dating back in mid-2004 after becoming friends on the sets of the films, Pearl Harbor (2001) and Daredevil (2003).

In June 2005, Jennifer and Ben married in a private Turks and Caicos ceremony.

They called in quits ten years later in June 2015.

After two years, they jointly filed their divorce legal documents in April 2017 and their divorce was finalized in October 2018.
description: Jennifer Garner was spotted walking hand-in-hand with her eldest daughter on Sunday morning with the 13-year-old nearly up to her 5ft8 stature.
